articles.title: Babar usurps Kohli in latest T20I rankings boost - International Cricket Council
articles.description: Pakistan captain Babar Azam can lay claim to being the top ranked T20I batter in the world for the longest period of time after he maintained his spot at the head of proceedings on the latest MRF Tyres ICC T20 batting rankings.
